select
from shangpinxinxi where shangpinbianhao = #{shangpinbianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select from shangpinxinxi where 1=1
and shangpinbianhao =#{shangpinbianhao}

select from shangpinxinxi where 1=1 and shangpinbianhao like concat('%',#{shangpinbianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shangpinmingcheng like concat('%',#{shangpinmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and leibie like concat('%',#{leibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and jiage >= concat('',#{jiage1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and jiage <= concat('',#{jiage2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and kucun >= concat('',#{kucun1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and kucun <= concat('',#{kucun2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and tupian like concat('%',#{tupian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and beizhu like concat('%',#{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

shangpinbianhao, shangpinmingcheng, leibie, jiage, kucun, tupian, beizhu,
